data.title: Mike Herrera on LinkedIn: Just chillin down here on Earth with our punk music videos and merch but‚Ä¶
data.meta_description:
Just chillin down here on Earth with our punk music videos and merch but don‚Äôt worry about that. üòâ
My band is called MxPx. Have a great day!
data.text:
I used to hate when people would call my band ‚ÄúSell Outs‚Äù. All these years later and we are still selling out venues around the world. Thanks for another Sold Out show! This is from MxPx at the House Of Blues Orlando!

The company is celebrating another win for the team!!And starting the year celebrating with friends! Thank you for everything! We‚Äôll see you in a few days!

Because work shouldn‚Äôt always be all work, I promised myself that I‚Äôd share more personal stories on LinkedIn. In this video I was inspired by a real life event, I stubbed my toe on some junk in the basement‚Ä¶ anger rising! MxPx - Ready to Rage Directed by Darren Doane

The whole crew and team worked overtime to make this project a success! Thank you Indonesia for singing so loud! The 33 hour trip home was a breeze! Find A Way Home!

We launched another project! Work is always a grind for me but this was fun! MxPx in Las Vegas, NV. When We Were Young Fest. ‚Ä¶and onto the next projext.

When the blooper reel gets a promotion!? At my work the ‚Äúunexpected‚Äù still happens! This was Kris Roe from the Ataris and I just getting our bearings on filming this promo. But it turns out we‚Äôre ready to announce Atlanta with the rest! Let‚Äôs go!!

Remember working retail? Me neither. This will make you jump around in your cubicle! Be careful. ‚ÄúThis Is What You Told Me‚Äù the official music video Directed by linked in champ Darren Doane and starring his son, Knox Doane. https://is.gd/EmoO5I

Over at ‚Äúwork‚Äù, my place of business shipped another project on time! Thank you for an epic night and for singing so loud Furnace Fest!! We had so much fun with all our friends!

My work released a new project. We shipped out on time and the market is loving the ‚Äúproduct‚Äù Available wherever you stream your music. Or‚Ä¶ mxpx.com
